name: bsidestarchild
text: Todd really should learn to read.

text: A comment left by knuckleheadbabylon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Ariamaki, cuddlefish, cryabetes, HaroldZidler, SurelySmack, clintisiceman)

text: I think you mean a crappy little bullshit man.

text: A comment left by waddlerz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Ariamaki, GeyserShitdick, Kensai)

name: abe
text: The next time you have somebody in your car, say this to them.

name: abe
text: A comment left by abe was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thumbfinger, Overmedicated, Thorfinn, Ariamaki, farqussus)

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Just because he can't read doesn't mean sucking dick didn't buy that van.

name: luckypyjamas
text: just because sucking dick bought the van doesn't mean he can't read

name: soup_alex
text: Why this doesn't have more chubbies, I can't fathom.

name: frances_bavier
text: i would like to see this license plate frame offered for sale. it would go over like hotcakes in my home town.

name: rapid_roy
text: A comment left by rapid_roy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by recognizer, Macht, dr_sexlove)

name: chrissketch
text: Your hometown differs from my hometown in profound ways.

name: caseyb3
text: Fewer than you'd think, good fellow; fewer than you'd think.

name: chaesar
text: He likes drugs, and doesn't seem to have a job, how you think he pays for things?

name: 1000hz
text: Stealin'

name: professoryes
text:
Stealin' Dick?

Oh. Todd. That had me a little worried.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: Selling smack out of his van.

name: theguitarhero
text: Being a private contractor?

name: capnroblivious
text: RUNNING.  RUNNING smack out of his van.  It's a very important distinction.

name: amberjunk
text: Classic.

name: someone3
text: i want one for my car!!!!

name: alejandroadam
text: todd seems pretty open about unwated male on male sex, ie. he wasn't fat, he was having tony c's prison baby.

name: deancain29
text: Todd's rad.

name: juancarlos
text: Says a lot about Todd that the best thing he got going in his life (his van) has THAT license plate and a horn that goes "If this band's a rockin', I'm doing coke listening to Dokken".

name: corbie
text: So what's canon, then - is his van made from a stork slain by his own hand , or did he buy it?

name: spectre
text: Strangely, the license plate holder came from the stork just as the plush chamber, tape deck, etc.

name: ntopp
text: It's possibly that Suckin' Dick bought the stork in the first place.

name: hyetal
text: The stork was from the Todd Creation Myth . Myth implies that it's not real.

name: ntopp
text: The same might be said for the talking squirrel school of comic-making.

name: hyetal
text:
Why would I say that? I sound like a dick.

Maybe Todd just updates his story periodically to keep us guessing, for the truth would be far too much for our puny minds to handle.

name: lizjones
text: Stranglin' stork bought this van.

name: diggidy
text: Maybe it's just because I'm already thinkin' bout dongs, but "stranglin' the stork" is an awesome euphemism for masturbation.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Alley-oop assistance: Mr. D. Perkins"

name: fox
text: when I was originally reading these strips 4 years ago, I was terribly confused by the ALT texts...  I still am :::

name: biff
text:
I have only been reading This Modern World for ten years.

I have read this strip many times since I discovered Achewood in 2006.

And this is the first time it has occurred to me to wonder if D. Perkins is Tom Tomorrow.

name: oishii
text: Is there anything suckin' dick can't buy? Not in my experience.

name: alphagator
text: it can't buy love, my materialistic friend

name: spinynorman
text: Can it buy more dick sucking?

name: relaxing
text: I beg to differ!

name: joeyramoney
text: i thought that teodor was a rabbit for a long time.

name: relaxing
text: I thought the cats were all dogs for a while.  The jowls.

name: tomsonlocal
text: What was Ray doing on the floor to even notice that in the first place.

name: falseprophet
text: Probably buying a van.

name: gyllstromk
text: Probably my favorite Achewood.

name: professoryes
text:
I picture one of those awful, brazen car commercials with the announcer screaming in your face. "COME DOWN TO SUCKIN' DICK! SUCKIN' DICK will get you the best deals! SUCKIN' DICK will give you cash for your old wreck!"

Truly dreadful.

name: nymphadoria
text: Sucking dick buys anything!

name: jawsh
text: This is probably my favorite achewood ever

name: dusty
text: Todd probably just got his van licensed in Texas and didn't want to pay to upgrade to one of the custom designs.

name: doubleclef
text: I wouldn't be surprised if that's how Todd did get that van... never know what he's going to do

name: hawaiian_robot
text: This comic is so great. This pretty much sold me on Achewood; only a handful of things have made me laugh to the point of tears (probably the only other thing was about how Bill Brasky date-raped David Bowie).

name: mikeronomicon
text: My old roommate had this incredibly shitty old astrovan, so I had to make a licence plate holder that said this on it. To my knowledge, he still hasn't seen it.

name: random_shorts
text: The frame is to clarify for the Squirril Police, since they explicitly asked.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Am I the only one who initially read this strip & immediately tried to read/translate a hidden message in "7CFL485"... and completely didn't see the license plate holder text until an embarrassing amount of minutes later?

Thought so.

name: re5urgam
text: Oh, no, I definitely did that way back when I first read this strip. You are not alone.

name: origotoshi
text: As did I. Well, it was only like 10 seconds, but still.
